about.aboutContent:
Hey Everyone!
The purpose of this application is to get you to start thinking about other ways you can get from place to place while decreasing your CO2 emissions and increasing your physical activity.

Before using the app download the tracking sheet to log all the trips you take in a week.

To use the app:
  1. Use the Directions widget to plan out your route and destination. Write the distance it calculates in your log sheet.
  2. Log your results in our form.
  3. Click on the Layer List widget to choose how you want to see the results.
  4. Use the Info Summary to see the results. 
    • Click on one of the circle to show a list of all the trips taken
    • Click on a trip from the list to highlight it on the map.
